Article.ArticleTitle: Complete genome sequence of a human enterovirus 71 strain isolated from a fatal case in shanghai, china, in 2012.

Abstract.AbstractText: The complete genome sequence of a human enterovirus 71 strain (SH12-276), isolated from a fatal case in Shanghai in 2012, was determined. Phylogenetic analysis based on the complete genome sequence classified this strain into subgenotype C4.
